name: Zombie Game (itch) (Ghostbyte01)
description:
This is a Starting point of a game 

Mouse - aim 

Mouse (Left Click) - Shoot

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

Weapons

Pistol - 2 Damage/High Accuracy/Low Speed

Assault Rifle - 1 Damage/Medium Accuracy/High Speed

Semi-Automatic Rifle - 2 Damage/ High Accuracy/Medium Speed

6 Health Starting

Small Zombies - Faster 3 health

Large Zombies - Slower 6 health

More Things to come!

Work in Progress

-New Weapons 

-Health Regen

-Waves

-Beginners Manual
